Application.name: Example
Application.description: A null application. The purpose of this xTEDS is to define templates for BIT interfaces.

Interface.name: FunctionalTest
Interface.description: The Functional Built-In Test is a basic functionality test. Typically initiated manually

Variable.name: functionalTestResultCode
Variable.description: The result of running a Built-In Functional Test

Drange.name: functionalTestResultCodes
Drange.description: An enumeration of all test results

Option.name: NOT_EXECUTED
Option.description: The test has not been executed.

CommandMsg.name: runFunctionalTest
CommandMsg.description: Run the Functional BIT and report results.

CommandMsg.name: getLastFunctionalTestResult
CommandMsg.description: Run the Functional BIT and report results.

Interface.name: PerformanceTest
Interface.description: The Performance Built-In Test is a more extensive operational test. Typically initiated manually.

Variable.name: performanceTestResultCode
Variable.description: The result of running a Built-In Performance Test

Drange.name: performanceTestResultCodes
Drange.description: An enumeration of all test results

Option.name: NOT_EXECUTED
Option.description: The test has not been executed.

CommandMsg.name: runPerformanceTest
CommandMsg.description: Run the Performance BIT and report results.

CommandMsg.name: getLastPerformanceTestResult
CommandMsg.description: Run the Performance BIT and report results.

Interface.name: OnOrbitCheckout
Interface.description: On-Orbit Checkout verifies operational readiness. Autonomously initiated by OOCE.

Variable.name: onOrbitCheckoutResultCode
Variable.description: The result of running an On-Orbit Checkout

Drange.name: onOrbitCheckoutResultCodes
Drange.description: An enumeration of all test results

Option.name: NOT_EXECUTED
Option.description: The On-Orbit Checkout has not been executed.

Variable.name: onOrbitCheckoutSubSeconds
Variable.description: Time On-Orbit Checkout was last executed.

CommandMsg.name: runOnOrbitCheckout
CommandMsg.description: Run the On-Orbit Checkout and report results.

CommandMsg.name: getLastOnOrbitCheckoutResult
CommandMsg.description: Run the On-Orbit Checkout and report results.
